plot: God tells Joan that she needs to give Adam and gift, which she mistakes at first for sex, so she follows him to a bedroom at the hotel where he works.

Studying for finals and working at a hotel because his dad can't work, Adam is tired and stressed. When God tells Joan that she needs to give Adam a gift, she goes to extremes trying to figure out what to get him. Searching his backpack for clues, she finds a condom and is convinced that God wants her to have sex with Adam. Kevin begins reporting from the courthouse and writes an article that influences a ruling, enraging his father. Glynis has a new boyfriend, so Luke joins Joan's study group and realizes his feelings for Grace are still strong.—Horomnizon
